summary: This is an email from an FBI agent regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case, confirming receipt of a true bill (indictment) and stating they are in the process of obtaining a GPS warrant. The email is related to crimes against children and human trafficking investigations.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email subject line indicates the communication is about Ghislaine Maxwell, who is the subject of the FBI's investigation into crimes against children and human trafficking.

events.title: True Bill Received for Maxwell
events.description: The FBI confirms they have received a true bill (grand jury indictment) for Ghislaine Maxwell and are in the process of obtaining a GPS warrant.

keyFacts: The FBI received a true bill (grand jury indictment) against Ghislaine Maxwell on or before June 29, 2020.
The FBI was in the process of obtaining a GPS warrant related to the Maxwell investigation.
The investigation was being handled by the FBI's Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking unit in New York.
The email confirms active legal proceedings against Maxwell for crimes against children and human trafficking.
